Title: Requiring that vehicles yield the right of way to multi-use trails that cross roadways
Summary: Requires that vehicles yield the right of way to multi-use trails that cross roadways.
LawCode: Amd ยง1151, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to clarifying that all trail users, including bicyclists, have right of way in crosswalks wherever the multi-use trail crosses a roadway
